items.q: Which critically acclaimed TV series famously features the warring families of the Starks, Lannisters, and Targaryens?
items.explanation: Based on George R.R. Martin's books, it became a massive global phenomenon for HBO.

items.q: The first Apple iPhone was officially released to the public in the year 2005.
items.explanation: The revolutionary first-generation iPhone was famously announced and released in 2007.

items.q: In the hit video game 'Fortnite', players natively jump out of a flying 'Battle Bus' to start the match.
items.explanation: The Battle Bus is one of the most iconic elements of the massively popular battle royale game.

items.q: What legendary Japanese animation studio, co-founded by Hayao Miyazaki, produced classics like 'Spirited Away' and 'My Neighbor Totoro'?
items.explanation: Their films are universally beloved for their stunning hand-drawn art and deeply emotional storytelling.

items.q: Which immensely popular open-world video game famously allows players to explore the fictional state of San Andreas as three distinct protagonists?
items.explanation: It remains one of the fastest-selling and most financially successful entertainment products ever created.

items.q: In the critically adored sitcom 'Parks and Recreation', what is the name of the fiercely libertarian, meat-loving department director played by Nick Offerman?
items.explanation: He became one of the internet's most universally beloved and frequently quoted television characters.

items.q: What British rock band famously released the groundbreaking concept albums 'The Dark Side of the Moon' and 'The Wall'?
items.explanation: They are widely considered pioneers of the massively influential progressive rock genre.

items.q: Which iconic 1980s slasher villain notoriously attacks his teenage victims uniquely within their dreams?
items.explanation: He is the central antagonist of the 'A Nightmare on Elm Street' film series.

items.q: In the Pokémon franchise, what is the electric-type mouse Pokémon that serves as the official mascot?
items.explanation: Pikachu is the universally recognized flagship character of the global brand.

items.q: Which American singer-songwriter released the massively successful critically acclaimed visual album 'Lemonade' in 2016?
items.explanation: The album debuted to widespread critical acclaim and cultural impact.
